ConfigItem.Name: API::Operation::V1::User::UserGet###AttributeWhitelist
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which attributes of the user data hash should be exported. Key = Attribute, Value = 1 if attribute should be exported. If nothing is defined, every attribute will be exported

ConfigItem.Name: API::Operation::V1::User::UserGet###AttributeBlacklist
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which attributes of the user data hash should NOT be exported. Key = Attribute, Value = 1 if attribute should not be exported. If nothing is defined, every attribute will be exported
